description:
Energy needs for customers voluntarily participating in the EnviroWatts green power program will be supplied from environmentally preferred sources such as biomass, solar, wind, water and geothermal springs. Currently those sources have a higher cost than most other sources of power. Green Power Rate Rider reflects an increased cost of one-and-one-half cents ($.015) per kilowatt-hour.
It is our hope that as more customers across the nation choose green power, additional investments will be made in environmentally friendly generation.

***Applicable to any member of the Corporation for single-phase or multi-phase service who is located on or adjacent to the lines of the Corporation suitable and adequate for rendering the service requested.

Accounts with less than 25,000 kWh per month must agree to take the entire amount in green power. Accounts that have 25,000 kWh per month, or more, will receive the first 25,000 kWhr per month in green power, and may then purchase additional green power blocks in 5,000 kWhr increments.

name: EnviroWatts- Green Power Rate Rider, All Customer Rate Classes
